jobDescription: As a Chef, you will be responsible for preparing and cooking delicious meals. Prerequisites for this position include a culinary school diploma or equivalent experience. Required skills include meal preparation, menu planning, and knowledge of food safety. Must be able to work weekends and holidays.

As a Waiter, you will provide excellent customer service to restaurant guests. Prerequisites for this position include a high school diploma or equivalent, and previous experience in a customer service role. Required skills include customer service, communication, and time management. Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment.
The Bartender is tasked with mixing and serving beverages in accordance with recipes and standards. Previous experience in a similar role is preferred.
The Dishwasher ensures the cleanliness and hygiene of the kitchen area. No prior experience is required, but a strong work ethic is a must.
The Manager oversees restaurant operations and staff. Previous management experience in a restaurant setting is required.
The Host/Hostess greets and seats guests and manages reservations. Excellent communication skills and a friendly demeanor are required.
The Server takes and delivers food and beverage orders. Previous experience in a similar role and excellent customer service skills are required.
The Busser clears and cleans tables and assists servers. A strong work ethic and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment are required.
The Kitchen Staff assists in various kitchen tasks. No prior experience is required, but a strong work ethic is a must.
The Sous Chef assists the Head Chef in managing the kitchen, including meal preparation, menu planning, and ensuring food safety standards are met. Previous experience in a similar role is required.
